sentences.sContent: Dead bodies of vertebrate in the field should not be collected or closely examined.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dead bodies of vertebrate in the field should not be collected or closely examined.
sentences.sCn: 不要太接近脊椎动物的尸体或收集它们作样本。

sentences.sContent: The unborn young of a viviparous vertebrate having a basic structural resemblance to the adult animal.
sentences.sContent_eng: The unborn young of a viviparous vertebrate having a basic structural resemblance to the adult animal.
sentences.sCn: 胎基本结构与成年动物相似的胎生脊椎动物未出生的幼子。

words.tran: 脊椎的；椎骨的；由椎骨组成的；有脊椎的
[解剖] 椎骨；[解剖] 脊椎

trans.tranOther: a living creature that has a backbone
